headline: Trump signs order blocking Wall St from buying single-family homes
summary: Investing.com-- U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday evening signed an executive order aimed at blocking Wall Street investors from buying and speculating on single-family homes.

content.title: Trump signs order blocking Wall St from buying single-family homes
content.summary: Investing.com-- U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday evening signed an executive order aimed at blocking Wall Street investors from buying and speculating on single-family homes.

headline: Assessing Blackstone (BX) Valuation After Mixed Recent Share Performance And A Premium 44.5x P/E
summary: Understanding Blackstone’s recent share performance Blackstone (BX) has seen mixed share performance recently, with a 1 day return of about a 6% decline, a flat week, a small gain over the past month and a roughly 5% decline over the past 3 months. Over longer holding periods, total returns are more dispersed, with a roughly 3% decline year to date, about a 13% decline over the past year, and very large gains over the past 3 and 5 years. These figures provide a snapshot of how the stock has...
